scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs src/js/menu.js src/js/sticky.js src/js/code.js src/js/single.js src/js/dark-mode.js --compress --mangle --warn --output assets/js/main.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/admin/admin.js --compress --mangle --output assets/js/admin/admin.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/admin/login.js --compress --mangle --output assets/js/admin/login.min.js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o assets/css/main.min.css src/css/style.css src/css/code.css && cleancss -o assets/css/admin/admin.min.css src/css/admin/admin.css && cleancss -o assets/css/admin/login.min.css src/css/admin/login.css
scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
